ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Join our Motion Technologies team and drive innovation that matters! Our ever-evolving suite of fitness and health features in Watch and iPhone are helping our users live more active, healthier lives. Come be a part of our multidisciplinary team as we shape the next generation of health and fitness solutions. If you're passionate about building technology that will make a difference, we may have the job for you.

ul.li: Solid understanding of algorithm design and data structures
Keen eye for syntactics, semantics and clarity of code
Strong and intuitive understanding of object-oriented designs
Working knowledge of embedded systems architecture
Strong communication skills, written and verbal, and attention to detail in design documentation

div.p: In this position, you will be working on motion sensing-related software. Roles and responsibilities include designing, implementing and maintaining APIs and algorithms for iOS and watchOS, optimizing implementations for power, memory and performance, debugging and maintaining existing code base, integrating algorithms and interfaces across multiple platforms and creating logging infrastructure to support debugging.
Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, EECS, or equivalent experience.
